column5: Hello all look i just wanted to let all you fellow walleye fisherpeople now that a ice breaker is coming through the bay of quinte again he will be coming from deseronto up to big bay(point anne),through the massasaga point area and up to belleville to myers peir now with the snow we just got you may not see his path so please if you do venture out don't go untill its light so you can see. and most popular spots are not safe yet anyway so sharpen your hooks and wait for safe ice some locals are fishing but we now where the thicker ice will be.  Taker easy and stay safe  Hawg Hunter
That tug and barge passed us last week while we were trolling near the Glenora Ferry, so he's obviously going past Deseronto and up the Reach... lost sight of him as he headed down Adolphus Reach. HH
i think you mean past the glenora ferry UP THE REACH TO DESERONTO  OBVIOUSLY  Hawg Hunter
